Items.Value: azl3 syslinux libpng-1.2.39 on Azure Linux 3.0

FullProductName.Value: azl3 syslinux libpng-1.2.39 on Azure Linux 3.0

Title.Value: Memory leak in the embedded_profile_len function in pngwutil.c in libpng before 1.2.39beta5 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (memory leak or segmentation fault) via a JPEG image containing an iCCP chunk with a negative embedded profile length.  NOTE: this is due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2006-7244.

CWE.Value: Missing Release of Memory after Effective Lifetime
